Latest Activity: Dec 20, 2013
description:
El 14 de Diciembre se celebra el día mundial de los coderetreat desde ComunidadTIC, BarCampNEA, PoloIT Chaco, PoloIT Corrientes, GDG Corrientes y NEAValley te queremos invitar a unirte a la iniciativa.

¿Necesito saber qué es TDD?

No es necesario, puedes venir a aprender. Con que disfrutes con el código es suficiente!

¿Qué debo llevar?

Un portátil con los entornos instalados y configurados y sus librerías xUnit (phpUnit, nUnit, jUnit, jasmine, rspec, qUnit...) del lenguaje que planees usar. Zapatilla, alargador.

¡Registrate!

Es totalmente gratuito, sólo necesitas un portátil (con el software que necesitas para tu lenguaje, o lo descargas ese mismo día) y ganas de pasarlo bien.

Para saber cuanto espacio vamos a necesitar ¡necesitamos que te inscribas!

https://eventioz.com.ar/coderetreat-corrientes

description:
Coderetreat is a day-long, intensive practice event, focusing on the fundamentals of software development and design. By providing developers the opportunity to take part in focused practice, away from the pressures of 'getting things done', the coderetreat format has proven itself to be a highly effective means of skill improvement. Practicing the basic principles of modular and object-oriented design, developers can improve their ability to write code that minimizes the cost of change over time.

Participate in the global coderetreat here in Sydney, NSW, Australia.

Bring a laptop with all the development tools you require to write code using your chosen programming languages.

Lunch will be provided. This event is free for everyone.

Once registered, refer to Corey Haines's coderetreat site for further details on what to expect or turn up and have a great day.

I'll only be there for part of the day, as I've got another event that day. :(

No problems at all Andrew. Happy to have you for as long as we can get you :)

What time does it start / finish? How much does it cost?

How do we access the office? Will there be someone downstairs to let us in? 

Yep, there'll be a bunch of ThoughtWorks people around and we'll let everyone in/man the doors.

title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Vienna, Austria
details:
Time: December 14, 2013 from 8:30am to 5pm
Location: Frequentis AG
Street: Innovationsstraße 1
City/Town: Vienna
Website or Map: http://gdcr13-vienna.eventbri…
Phone: +4369918194880
Event Type: coderetreat, gdcr, gdcr13
Organized By: Mike Leber
Latest Activity: Dec 15, 2013
description:
Since we started with the first Global Day of Coderetreat in 2011 Vienna already has a vivid crowd of software craftsmen, which is key for great companies and products, fit for the future. Software craftsmanship is the missing link many of us often even miss in so called Agile projects.

This year we have Peter Kofler as facilitator on board. Peter probably is the most experienced facilitator for Coding Dojos and Coderetreats around Vienna at the moment. He just did his journeyman tour and many different facilitations as well as public talks. So your chances to learn great stuff at our event are tremendous. And of course it will be great fun too!

Want to join as participant? Get your ticket here (it's free, we just ask for a deposit, which will be returned immediately to those showing up) -http://gdcr13-vienna.eventbrite.de
Know others, your friends, peers at work, who might be interested too? Please, help spreading the word and tell them about our event.

Want to see your company as sponsor? Please get in contact with us a toffice@agileexperts.at

Looking forward to seeing you at the GDCR13 Vienna!
best, Mike Leber

PS: we are currently in touch with 2-3 options for the location in Vienna and let you know soon about it.

Was a great code retreat! Thanks for organizing this. Thanks all the sponsors for making this possible. Thanks Peter for facilitating.

It is great to meet like-minded developers also interested in improving professionally and making the most of themselves.

It is also a very productive place to practice coding, test-driven-development, learn, reflect, have new insights and have fun!

Looking forward to the next one, to coding dojos, katas and pair-programming.
name: Vienna, Austria

description:
OPITZ CONSULTING Deutschland GmbH is hosting the Global Day of Code Retreat 2013 in Essen this year.

 // German //

Ein "Coderetreat" ist eine ganztägige Veranstaltung zum Üben und Verbessern der Fähigkeiten zur Software-Entwicklung und des Software-Designs. In entspannter Atmosphäre und ohne den Druck "fertig" werden zu müssen, können sich Entwickler vollständig auf das Programmieren selbst konzentrieren, Erkenntnisse gewinnen und Erfahrungen mit anderen Teilnehmern austauschen.

Am Global Day of Coderetreat finden in vielen Städten auf der ganzen Welt Coderetreats statt - so auch dieses Jahr in Essen. Der Veranstaltungsort ist der Standort der OPITZ CONSULTING Deutschland GmbH.

Voraussetzung für die Teilnahme ist ein funktionsfähiges Notebook, auf dem alle Entwicklungstools eingerichtet sind, die Sie für das Entwickeln in Ihrer Lieblingsprogrammiersprache benötigen.

description:
Am 14. Dezember findet weltweit der Global Day of Coderetreat statt und wir machen mit.

Ein Coderetreat ist ein Workshop für Softwareentwickler, bei dem im Rahmen von 6 Sessions à 45 Minuten eine Programmieraufgabe mit unterschiedlichen Herausforderungen bearbeitet wird. Die Programmiersprache ist dabei frei wählbar; entwickelt wird grundsätzlich zu zweit (Pair Programming) und testgetrieben (TDD). Weitere Informationen…

Warum sollte ich dahin gehen?

  1. um moderne Softwareentwicklung zu erleben
  2. um bekannte Techniken zu vertiefen und zu hinterfragen
  3. um sich mit anderen Entwicklern auszutauschen

Bitte bring einen Laptop mit funktionierender und getesteter Entwicklungsumgebungen für deine Programmiersprache(n) inklusive Framework für Unit-Tests mit. Wir wollen keine Zeit für Einrichtung verlieren. Wenn du im Paar kommst, dann reicht auch ein Laptop.

Gleichzeitig organisiert der SoCraMOB auch in Bielefeld einen Coderetreat im Rahmen des Global Day of Coderetreat.

title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Fukui, Japan
details:
Time: December 14, 2013 all day
Location: Fukui, Japan
Website or Map: https://maps.google.co.jp/map…
Event Type: coderetreat, gdcr, gdcr13
Organized By: Hiroki Kondo
Latest Activity: Nov 15, 2013
description:
Coderetreat is a day-long, intensive practice event focused on the fundamentals of software development and design.The unique coderetreat format (which eliminates the pressure of 'getting things done' and focuses on practicing basic principles of good design) has proven to be a highly effective (and fun) means of skill improvement.

On December 14th, Coderetreats will be held at cities all over the world. To celebrate this significant event, we'll be participating in some global activities in addition to our normal Coderetreat activities.

You only need to bring a laptop with the development tools you require to write code using your chosen programming languages. 

Check out coderetreat.org for further details on what to expect.

Coderetreatとは、ソフトウェアの設計と開発の基礎を徹底的に練習する終日イベントです。仕事では必ずさらされる「終わらせなければならないプレッシャー」からできる限り開放され、「良い設計とはなにか」を考え、実践することに集中できるようイベントが設計されています。そのため、効果的にプログラミング技術を向上させられる楽しいイベントです。

来る12/14、32時間に渡り200以上の世界中の都市でCoderetreatが開催されます。この記念的な日に参加することで、通常のCoderetreatに加えて、世界中のプログラマとちょっとした交流をするなど、グローバルな体験をすることができるでしょう。

必要なものはコードを書くためのノートパソコンと、あなたの選んだプログラミング言語の開発環境、そしてちょっとした勇気です。

(終日のイベントですが、軽食等用意させていただきます。)

お申込み等詳しい事は申し込みサイトを参照してください。
name: Fukui, Japan

title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Skopje, Macedonia
details:
Time: December 14, 2013 from 9am to 5pm
Location: Media Lab

Organized By: Dalibor Nasevic
Latest Activity: Dec 13, 2013
description:
Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 ќе се случи по трет пат и во Македонија. Ве покануваме да ни се придружите на 14ти Декември во просториите на Media Lab во Скопје.

Coderetreat е еднодвенен настан на кој интензивно вежбаме ОО дизајн на софтвер. За време на Coderetreat програмираме во парови и разменуваме знаење. Пишуваме код така што прво ќе напишеме тест за истиот и ги применуваме основни правила на едноставен дизајн.

Форматот на настанот е:

- го решаваме Conway's Game of Life проблемот
- програмираме во парови 45 мин и потоа го бришеме кодот
- правиме 15 минути пауза и ретроспектива
- правиме промена на парови и нова сесија

Спонзори на настанот се Ever-Near и Media Lab. За сите учесници ќе има маици со принт од настанот.
name: Skopje, Macedonia

Colima will be participating in the Global Day of Coderetreat 2013!

Coderetreat is a day-long, intensive practice event focused on the fundamentals of software development and design.The unique coderetreat format (which eliminates the pressure of 'getting things done' and focuses on practicing basic principles of good design) has proven to be a highly effective (and fun) means of skill improvement.  Check out to Corey Haines's coderetreat site if you want further details on what to expect.

On December 14th, Coderetreats will be held at cities all over the world. To celebrate this significant event, we'll be participating in some global activities in addition to our normal Coderetreat activities. Afterwards, stick around and we'll all go out to dinner or for a few drinks. It's going to be a lot of fun!

 
You only need to bring a laptop with the development tools you require to write code using your chosen programming languages.  A continental breakfast and lunch will be provided.

Latest Activity: Dec 20, 2013
description:
Zilverline is hosting the Global Day Coderetreat 2013.

Our maximum amount of participants is 20 people. 

Zilverline also sponsors:

- free parking at Science Park (between buildings Matrix 400 and 402)
- lunch, drinks and snacks

When do you start and what’s the plan?

The plan:

Walk-in at 8:30

Introduction 9:00

First start coderetreat session 9:30

After two sessions we either do another one, or have a (free) lunch (group decision)

We have beer at 16:00

We aim at 5, perhaps 6 (depends on energy) coderetreats.

Conway's Game of Life ? Last year we did Game of Life as well. This year the Code Retreat participants in Cambridge will have a go at it. I'll look up some (hopefully) fresh ideas in mathematical game literature (Smullyan, Allen Paulos etc.).

Yes, Conway's Game of life, it might be a bit repetative if you did many coderetreats before. However, you could also visit a legacy coderetreat session, which uses a different 'puzzle' ;) 

Debugging a legacy code implementing Game of Life? Sounds cool!

Yes, not this time though.

You should attend a "Legacy Code Retreat" for that. I'd recommend it ;-)

Thank you all, I really had fun today!

Yes, it was really fun. Thanks for coming all; 

as promised, here some urls:

Life in life: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xP5-iIeKXE8
Stephen Hawking about GoL: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CgOcEZinQ2I

Thanks again,

If you want to know about more events, check my twitter feed @stefanhendriks and keep watching the Coderetreat events!

As promised I would let you send a link about the Legacy Coderetreat - http://legacycoderetreat.typepad.com/

description:
Calling fellow hackers,

Active Capital IT is hosting a Global Code Retreat Day. What you get to do is:-
Meet other like minded developers and be part of a broader initiative
Get to mentor other developers from the industry and learn from them
Learn new tools, technologies and languages (Different and diverse programming languages and perspectives are appreciated). Kudos to the person who can implement the Game of Life in Stored Database Procedures :)
Come up with your own game plan and learn about concepts such as code coverage, pair programming, good design and happy coding.
Hopefully this will be the first of many events that will eventually gear into other Hacking / Open Source Initiatives.
And remember, we are all here to learn. So if you havent put on that programming cap in a while, now is the best time to brush up on resources. Creative and novel approaches will be applauded.

Looking forward to your presence at 11:00 am on Saturday[14th December, 2013]. Location Details are available here: http://www.acit.com/contact/

And dont forget to RSVP at http://archive.coderetreat.org/events/gdcr-2013-karachi

description:
Unruly is hosting a Global Day Coderetreat 2013 at our offices in London. We use XP every day so have a really nice space for pair programming.

Facilitator: Steve Tooke

Global Day of Coderetreat is a world-wide event celebrating passion and software craftsmanship. Last year, over 1800 passionate software developers in 94 cities around the world spent the day practicing the craft of software development using the coderetreat format. This year,200 cities from all over the world will host such events. Since our community pioneered code retreats in Europe, we are glad to continue this tradition. 

What's it about?

During a code retreat we use pair-programming, to learn from each other. We write our code using Test-Driven Development while applying design principles to produce clean code. Our focus is on learning and there's no pressure to produce a working solution for the problem.

The format of a code retreat is: 

  • Problem: Conway’s Game of Life
    • 45 mins write the best code with your pair
    • delete your code (yes, it can be hard)
    • 10 minutes retrospectives
    • 5 minutes break
    • change your pair 
  • We have 2-3 coding sessions in the morning
  • Break for lunch around 1pm
  • 2-3 more coding sessions in the afternoon.
  • At the end, we'll have a longer retrospective

This code retreat is language agnostic, the main principles are the same for each language. We're hoping to setup some of our pairing workstations for use by code retreat participants but please feel free to bring your own laptop if you have a specific language and IDE that you'd like to use.

Please aim to arrive by 9am so we can start coding at 9:30am. Lunch and refreshments will be provided.

About the organisers

Unruly are hosting this retreat because we use XP practices everyday and would like to encourage developers to learn more about how much fun it is to work this way. We're always on the lookout for great people to join our team.

About our facilitator

Steve Tooke is an independent programmer, trainer and coach. Passionate about improving his craft and helping others improve theirs. He specialises in helping teams produce business value continuously through improving communication and keeping their code maintainable. BDD is at the core of this process. 

Free registration via Eventbrite
name: (Spitalfields) London, UK

Raleigh/Durham, NC is participating in the Global Day of Coderetreat 2013! This event will be facilitated by Cory Foy and hosted at the Cognitect offices in downtown Durham.

Coderetreat is a day-long, intensive practice event focused on the fundamentals of software development and design.The unique coderetreat format (which eliminates the pressure of 'getting things done' and focuses on practicing basic principles of good design) has proven to be a highly effective (and fun) means of skill improvement.

On December 14th, Coderetreats will be held at cities all over the world. To celebrate this significant event, we'll be participating in some global activities in addition to our normal Coderetreat activities.

You only need to bring a laptop with the development tools you require to write code using your chosen programming languages. 

Check out coderetreat.org for further details on what to expect.

Registration is now open! Visit https://www.eventbrite.com/e/global-day-of-code-retreat-raleighdurham-tickets-9351589857 to register!

description:
Global Day of Coderetreat - щорічна подія, що відбувається по всьому світу з метою зібрати програмістів, котрі мають бажання попрактикуватися в передових техніках розробки. Минулого 2012 року прийняли участь більше ніж 2000 розробників із 150 міст світу.

Що таке Coderetreat

CodeRetreat проходить у форматі одноденної зустрічі, що базується на практиках TDD та парного програмування.

Парне програмування з акцентом на написання досконалого коду, а не на вирішення проблеми, дає прекрасну можливість отримати чи вдосконалити свої навики програмування в компанії інших розробників.

Весь день ділиться на 6 сесій по 45 хвилин.

Підчас сесії пари розв’язують задачу Conway’s Game of Life, придуману англійським математиком Джоном Конвейем (John Horton Conway). Після кожної сесії пари міняються, щоб максимально сприяти передачі досвіду та знань. Між сесіями весь код видаляється, що дає шанс зробити кожну наступну сесію кращую, не обмежуючись попереднім рішенням.

Реєстрація

Попередня реєстрація на сайті Coderetreat . 

UPDATE 8 DEC 2013: Для реєстрації заповніть форму.

Вхід безкоштовний.

"Обмеження" :)

25 учасників, всі хто зареєструвався пізніше потрапляють у список очікування.

Щоб “пройти фейсконтроль”, потрібно:

  • мати ноутбук, з налаштованим середовищем розробки (можна один на пару)
  • переглянути відео на сайті (coderetreat.org/about)
  • знати та розуміти основи TDD
  • Познайомитися з правилами Conway’s Game of Life (Wikipedia on Game_of_Life )

Подія відбувається за підтримки компанії Itera - лідера в сфері розробки технологічних та комунікаційних рішень.

Підчас події будемо "зідзвонюватися" з іншими містами:

  • Global day Coderetreat в Києві
  • Global day Coderetrea в Одесі
  • Global day Coderetreat в інших містах
